        • public void setCacheManagerName(java.lang.String name)

          Set the name of the EHCache CacheManager (if a specific name is desired).

          See Also:
          net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager#setName(String)

        • public void setConfigLocation(org.springframework.core.io.Resource location)

          Set the location of the EHCache config file. A typical value is "/WEB-INF/ehcache.xml".

          Default is "ehcache.xml" in the root of the class path, or if not found, "ehcache-failsafe.xml" in the EHCache jar (default EHCache initialization).

          See Also:
          net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager#create(java.io.InputStream)
          net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager#CacheManager(java.io.InputStream)

        • public void setRebuildable(boolean rebuildable)
